levelledPara.title: Purpose
levelledPara.para: The gussets reinforce the structural junction between the BH-STA350 bulkhead and Frame C0. They distribute local stresses and improve load transfer under pressurization and aerodynamic loads.

levelledPara.title: Construction
levelledPara.para: Each gusset is machined from AL-7075-T6 and features a flanged L-profile with radiused corners. The gussets are fastened using Hi-Lok bolts and bonded with structural adhesive to minimize fretting.

levelledPara.title: Installation
levelledPara.para: Gussets are installed symmetrically on both sides of Frame C0, aligned with the vertical web of the bulkhead. Access is provided through removable inspection panels on the forward side of the center body.

levelledPara.title: Compliance
levelledPara.para: The gussets are designed in accordance with CS-25.561 and CS-25.571 for static and fatigue loading. Their geometry is validated through finite element analysis and physical test coupons.
